TopicTitle: Quick question about a certain parameter

Articles.Content: Is it just me or the angZ parameter, in the node definitions, seems to do nothing at all?

I would assume it stands for the Z angle, so it has to do with the left and right rotation.

X rotation = forward & back/up & down

Z rotation = left & right

Y rotation = clockwise & counterclockwise
That\'s what I assumed, too, but when I tried setting it to ANY value, the model stayed immobile (I required it for a mod of mine, although I think I found a workaround)
